GeneralExplanationGrp.MediumExplanationTxt: PART VI-B, LINE 1A(3) HAS BEEN ANSWERED "YES" BECAUSE BOTH JEAN MARKLEY AND ROBERT MARKLEY ARE SUBSTANTIAL CONTRIBUTORS TO THE BRIGHTON FOUNDATION TRUST AND ARE THEREFORE DISQUALIFIED PERSONS. THEY PROVIDE "SERVICE" TO THE ORGANIZATION BY KEEPING ITS BOOKS AND SERVING ON ITS BOARD. LINE 1B IS ANSWERED "NO" BECAUSE THESE SERVICES ARE EXCEPTED BY THE REGULATIONS UNDER SECTION 4941.
